ue module¶

class ue.Ue(params, ue_id, traffic_type, starting_state)¶

Bases: traffic_model.TrafficModel

add_new_packet(current_tick: int)¶

Add a new packet in the queue and compute the next generation instant, if the buffer is not full. Otherwise, just discard the packet.

check_scheduling_request_need(priority_metric=None)¶
decode_harq(harq_list: List[packet.HARQ])¶

Find the HARQ intended for this UE and remove the (portion of) packets that have been correctly received

harq_listlist

List of HARQ classes

None

decode_hybrid_arq(hybrid_arq_dataframe)¶
g_node_b_get_scheduling_request_periodicity()¶
generate_pucch(current_time, first_pusch_attempt)¶

Generate the pucch packet, given the queue of the current UE.

current_timeint

Current time from the beginning of the simulation in ticks, needed to compute packet elapsed time.

first_pusch_attemptint

Time elapsing from the beginning of the simulation to the next first PUSCH occasion in ticks, needed to avoid asking for resources which will never be exploited in the future

pucchPUCCH

Pucch data with the related fields.

generate_pusch(current_time: int, n_bytes_overhead_5g_nr: Optional[int] = None)¶

Generate the PUSCH packet, given the queue of the current UE.

current_timeint

Current time in ticks, needed to compute packet elapsed time.

n_bytes_overhead_5g_nrint

Number of bytes introduced by the 5G-NR protocol stack. If None, they have been already included by the UE in the previous mapping

pucchPUSCH

PUSCH data with the related fields.

is_pdcch_for_me(pdcch_list: List[packet.PDCCH])¶

Checks whether there is a PDCCH intended for this UE

pdcch_listlist

List of PDCCH

is_pdcch_for_mebool

True if the PDCCH has been found, false otherwise

su_index: list of tuples

The indexes of the scheduling unit in which the UE can transmit its PUSCH

n_rbs_per_su: list of tuples

Number of resource blocks assigned for the transmission of the PUSCH

rb_index: list of tuples

The indexes of the resource blocks assigned for the transmission of the PUSCH
